title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive web application that provides users with the ability to easily check the weather outlook for any city around the world.

title: Password Generator
description: A responsive web application designed for personal or professional use which generates passwords of varying complexities based on user-selected criterias.

title: Day Scheduler
description: A simple and intuitive application that helps users manage their time effectively. This fully responsive application utilizes jQuery to dynamically update the UI and store data locally, ensuring that the schedule is accessible even without internet connection.

title: Code Quiz
description: A dynamic and interactive web application, where users are presented with multiple-choice code-related questions. The application tracks the user's progress, calculates the score, provides feedback on the answers, and save the user's high score.

title: Console Financial Analysis
description: A financial analysis application which analyzes a given dataset and outputs financial perfomances in the Console.

title: ReadMe Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input using the NPM Inquirer package.
